metadata.title: CVE-2021-44590 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In libming 0.4.8, a memory exhaustion vulnerability exist in the functioncws2fws in util/main.c. Remote attackers could launch denial of serviceattacks by submitting a crafted SWF file that exploits this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
